name: The house of Horrors
description:
You are remembered of a childhood friend of yours who seems pretty lonely nowadays. You think it's a good idea to pay her a visit and make sure that she's okay. You knock on the door of her forest mansion and her familiar voice welcomes you. As you walk past the doorstep the door is shut and locked behind you. With a flashlight in your hand you start to panic...       Flee the house!

Use headphones and fullscreen mode for the best experience!

Everything made by Blaha in a week for the themed horror game jam 11. Try to find all 3 ways to escape the house!
